list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Refactor to detach Storage from Logic in the TransactionAggregator
* Create TransactionStatisticsStore that holds all the TransactionStatistics * Change TransactionAggregator to use the new store * Refactor code to make use of functional constructs * Changed how TransactionStatistics are stored, now there is no need to store an empty TransactionStatistics. * Add method TransactionStatistics.from(Transaction).

task.summary:
Make TransactionStatistics serialize to string instead of number
* Change how minimum value of transaction is decided.

Refactor to detach Storage from Logic in the TransactionAggregator
* Create TransactionStatisticsStore that holds all the TransactionStatistics * Change TransactionAggregator to use the new store * Refactor code to make use of functional constructs * Changed how TransactionStatistics are stored, now there is no need to store an empty TransactionStatistics. * Add method TransactionStatistics.from(Transaction).
